action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: A snowboarder is performing a jump in the air above a snowy slope with snow-covered trees in the background. The sky is clear and blue.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A snowboarder is performing a jump over a snow ramp in a snowy landscape with trees and houses in the background. The snowboarder is wearing a green jacket and yellow pants, and the ramp has orange markings.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A snowboarder is performing a jump in the air above a snowy slope with snow-covered trees in the background. The sky is clear and blue.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is the sky in your image clear and blue?

This is my DESCRIPTION: A snowboarder is performing a jump over a snow ramp in a snowy landscape with trees and houses in the background. The snowboarder is wearing a green jacket and yellow pants, and the ramp has orange markings.
QUESTION: Is the sky in your image clear and blue? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any houses visible in the background of your image?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Are there any houses visible in the background of your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: Yes
